summary: Despite how loud Bakugou is, he’s actually an introvert. He doesn’t actually go to sleep at 8:30 at night, he just takes the...
body:
Despite how loud Bakugou is, he’s actually an introvert. He doesn’t actually go to sleep at 8:30 at night, he just takes the time to unwind privately for a few hours before bed- maybe get some homework done.

Submitted by @kingdomheartstrash

reblog.comment:

blog.name: slightly-less-might
blog.title: It’s Your Turn Next
blog.description: Lots of love for the sunflower man ❤️

body:
Teacher All Might Headcannons

- Toshinori is absolutely one of those people who leaves the cursor in the middle of the video when he is trying to play it. He also doesn’t understand full screen.

- He doesn’t really understand how his phone works and every time something happens that he didn’t expect he asks Deku about it. Even if Deku is in the middle of class.

- When he discovered what a hyperlink was he put them in all his lessons. They never worked. He even tried to print them out and give them as homework and nobody corrected him.

- Iida constantly tries to help him much to everyone else’s disappointment because it’s just more fun to waste lesson time. Iida believes as class rep it is his job to help the teachers and ensure they get the maximum time devoted to their studies.

- “When I was your age we didn’t have any of this technology!” Still won’t tell them how old he actually is.

- Can’t work the interactive white board. He just can’t.

- Absolutley usless at dicipline to the point that whener the kids are taking the piss he just calls Aizawa because they actually listen to him. He only had to do it once.

- Nobody gets over the fact that he calls Aizawa ‘Aizawa-kun’ and he just lets him.

- He is terrible at grading them because he doesn’t want anyone to fail. He even got Deku to help mark the class tests at one point.

- Buys white board markers in all colours because he thought they were just neat.

- Actually bought sharpies and the white board ended up needing to be replaced.

- Tries very hard to not show favouritism towards Deku to the point where he actually ignores him when he’s teaching. Doesn’t reallise he’d have to do that all the time for people to believe it.

- Kaminari takes great pride in short circuiting his computer and did so regularly unti Aizawa caught him and he was put on house arrest for a week.

- Still excellent at martial arts but often forgets he can’t rely on his quirk anymore. He has been seen fighting with Aizawa after hours in order to refadjust his fighting style to go with his body type. He struggles and he can never fight for long due to his stamina being terrible but he tries so hard that he has to be stopped sometimes. He trains alone as well because sometimes his pride just can’t take being watched.

- Bakugou caught him training alone one evening and has had more respect for him ever since.

- Definitely brings his class cookies - sometimes they’re even edible. Ends up taking a couple of lessons from Sato who spends the entire time star struck. Mamma Midoriya also helps him with making his diet more interesting.

- He takes Deku home a lot and often eats dinner with him. Ends up not being able to help him with his homework because Deku is better than he is. He does have the power of the answer sheet though.


If anyone has any prompts or Headcannons let me know! Share! I’m open to writing fics too if there are any I really like. One day I might even turn some of these into fics 😊

- He doesn’t really understand how his phone works and every time something happens that he didn’t expect he asks Deku about it. Even if Deku is in the middle of class.

Mr. Compress: Why do you like being out in the rain?
Toga: I like splashing in the puddles and rain is just fun.
Dabi: I'm...
body:
Mr. Compress: Why do you like being out in the rain?
Toga: I like splashing in the puddles and rain is just fun.
Dabi: I'm trying to get hit by lightning.
